Dialogue.Page: We came here from the [NAME] system to share the knowledge we found there. Unfortunatley, our vessel, [SP NAME], suffered damage upon our arival.
The black hole in our warp core malfunctioned in some way, and now [SP NAME] is rapidly miniaturizing into it!
Worse still, we couldn't even recover any of our exploration logs as all the computers refused to show anything other than "EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY"
If [SP NAME] isn't fixed, we won't be able to recover our exploration logs. And, if those logs aren't recovered, all the knowledge we gained will be lost.
If only we had enough time to fix [SP NAME]...
We appreciate your offer, but I'm worried there's just no chance for us to save our exploration logs.
We would need to figure out what's wrong with [SP NAME], find a solution, and fix [SP NAME] all before it is sucked into the black hole.
We only had just over 20 minutes to evacuate so, unfortunately, I don't see any way to get all that done in what little time we have...

If you want to try anyways, you can use this shuttle behind me to warp directly to [SP NAME], though it may be wise to bring your own ship just in case. Just make sure to evacuate if you can't fix [SP NAME] before it's completely gone.
